function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate data for planning and decision-making","Impact":"Ineffective response to COVID-19 impact on construction workers' health","Mitigation":"Collect comprehensive data on COVID-19 impacts, prioritize data analysis, and make informed decisions","Technologies":"Data collection and analysis tools","People":"Construction workers, public health officials","Owner":"Researchers, public health agencies"},{"Description":"Risk tolerance and management not critically performed","Impact":"Inefficient risk management for COVID-19 in construction projects","Mitigation":"Implement rigorous risk assessment, improve risk tolerance levels, and develop effective risk management strategies","Technologies":"Risk assessment tools, data analytics for risk tolerance analysis","People":"Construction project managers, risk managers","Owner":"Construction companies, risk management teams"},{"Description":"Lack of new safety procedures for pandemic response","Impact":"Increased vulnerability of construction workers to COVID-19","Mitigation":"Develop and implement new safety frameworks and procedures, provide training on pandemic response","Technologies":"Safety technology, training modules","People":"Construction workers, safety professionals","Owner":"Construction companies, safety authorities"}]}
